questions.question: What is the capital of Australia?
questions.answer: Canberra is the capital of Australia.

questions.question: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations?
What is the Paris Agreement about?
questions.answer: An international treaty on climate change adopted in 2015.

questions.question: Which country has the largest population?
What is cryptocurrency?
questions.answer: Digital currency using cryptography for security.

questions.question: What are the BRICS nations?
questions.answer: Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa, and more since 2024.

questions.question: What is AI?
questions.answer: Simulation of human intelligence by machines.

questions.question: What is the World Economic Forum?
questions.answer: International organization hosting the Davos meeting.

questions.question: What is the ISS?
questions.answer: Modular space station in low Earth orbit.
